title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Development and Application of an Online Learning Perception Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistical analysis skills and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: One can explain the four dimensions (instructor characteristics, social presence, instructional design, and trust) of the online learning perception scale
One can collect online learning perception data using survey tools
One can validate the scale’s validity through basic statistical analyses (exploratory factor analysis, confirmatory factor analysis)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
